name: Robot Inc, Idle Factory Tycoon
description:
Restore a factory to its former glory and be the BIG BOSS/most popular money-crazed business tycoon of all time (Its a myth of rich!) with ROBOT, Inc. Idle Factory! That's where there's no room for human laziness. All wealth is made by ROBOTS.

This is exactly simulation tapping game was made for you, BIG BOSS! Click and tap just for a little while. Then, let Mad Management Robotic do their job - make money, make you rich, expand your factory further and become the greatest money tycoon ever!

The best of all idle clicker tycoon games!

We are waiting for you, BIG BOSS! Hop on and grow your own factory business empire!

ROBOT, Inc. FEATURE:

ROBOT, Inc. FACTORY CLICKER THAT MAKES YOU RICH
• Lazy live like a really tycoon lifestyle but doing business effectively, manage hard-work robots, collect money idle... and you will become the wealthiest of all time!
• Automate your workflow to increase your idle income, it is a big-big money!
• Tap or click to make money, expand your factories floor with many different manufacturing industries … Keep clicking! This is the secret to getting riches.
• Luckily always come to the rich man. More money means more lucky feature everyday, spin, special daily gift... BIG BOSS.
• Manage more than 18 cool factories.
• Get idle money, even when you are offline.
• Hire managers to speed up the profit of ROBOTS! Every manager will have a different style.
• Profit from a smart investment or two to boost you on a RICH LIST.
• Brag about wealth of your factory on social media!

HOP ON BIG BOSS! You’re just a click and a tap away from rising to fame and raking in that sweet cash!
Become the greatest factory tycoon ever!

P.S. Got questions? Suggestions?
We’re ready to assist you, Big Boss! Talk to us via dung@gameasa.com & join our community of business people in fb.com/robotinc.gameasa
